attributes.action: Stop the use of anonymous phone calls to social services
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We need more transparency with the social services and family law courts, they get immense ammounts of money to meet adoption targets, and we need to stop anonymous phone calls to social services to stop malicious persons from doing this, they should be thoroughly investigated themselves it should be a criminal offence to make false allegations.
